5. Errands on Friday – 2 hours

First, calculate the totals for each day separately before finding the grand total. Here are the timestamps:
Monday:  1 hr
Tuesday:   3 hrs
Thursday: (half as long as the cooking class), so half of 3hrs -> 1.5 hrs
Friday:    2 hrs

Total hours used = Monday hours + Tuesday hours + Thursday hours + Friday hours
                          = 1 hr + 3 hrs + 1.5 hrs + 2 hrs
                          = 7.5 hrs

To identify the busiest day according to available options above without considering fractional part ('two'), look into halving the numbers first. Halving gives fractions too small like .5 instead of counting seconds/minutes etc..
